revised_title: Influential Scientific Civil Servant and National Defence Contributor
tldr: William Richard Joseph Cook was a prominent scientific civil servant who dedicated his career to national defense. He worked on various defense projects, including external ballistics, rocket development, and nuclear weapons. Cook's expertise in applied mathematics and engineering led to significant contributions to the effectiveness of weapons and equipment for the UK's fighting forces. He later became the first director of the rocket development establishment at Westcott and played a crucial role in the development of guided missiles.
